system.notes: Sealed against the void. Provides Four hours of air, can replace air tank as full action without compromising seal.. Has integrated Vox, mag-boots, lamp-pack and clip harness. Breached if taking more than 2xAP damage, can be repaired as Full Action with tape, patches, etc)
